info.title: Translate and Lip Sync API
info.description: This RESTful API offers dubbing and lip sync resources for enterprise use. With this API an audio or video input can be dubbed to new language(s).

post.description: Generates transcripts for the input audio or video.

Generate dubbed video or audio.

A composited lip sync can be added for video dubbing.

requestBody.description: The dub request body is used to specify either an audio dubbing or a video dubbing.

get.summary: Get the result for a job
get.description: Provides the result for an async dub job.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job id to get status for an async dub job

AudioInputMediaType.description: The audio media type of the input file. Use a supported type.

VideoInputMediaType.description: The video media type of the input file. Use a supported type.

TranscriptInputLocale.description: The languages that the transcript will be generated in. Use supported locale codes.

DubTargetLocaleCodes.description: Supported target locale codes for dubbing

TargetCaptionFormats.description: Supported target formats for caption generation

AudioInput.description: The audio input details for a dub request.

VideoInput.description: The video input details for a dub request.

source.description: The pre-signed URL to download the translated/edited transcripts.

TranscriptInput.description: Transcript input details for transcribe request.

captions.description: Captions related details to generate captions for transcribe request

TranscribeAudioInput.description: The request body for transcribing audio.

TranscribeVideoInput.description: The request body for transcribing video.

url.description: The pre-signed URL pointing to the input source.
The pre-signed URL pointing to the output source.

lipSync.description: If `true`, a high-quality composited lip sync will be used in the video output.

statusUrl.description: URL to download the results of the job.

AudioOutputMediaType.description: Media type of the audio output

VideoOutputMediaType.description: Media type of the video output

AudioInputToGenerateTranscriptFromTarget.summary: Generate transcript for audio input in specified languages

VideoInputToGenerateTranscriptFromTarget.summary: Generate transcript for video input in specified languages

AudioInputToGenerateTranscriptAndCaption.summary: Generate transcript and captions from target formats for Audio input

source.url: <pre-signed url for downloading the audio input>

VideoInputToGenerateTranscriptAndCaption.summary: Generate transcript and captions from target formats for Video input

source.url: <pre-signed url for downloading the video input>

destination.url: <URL where the transcription for audio/video can be downloaded>
<URL where the caption for audio/video can be downloaded>
<URL where the transcription for audio/video can be downloaded>
<URL where the transcription for audio/video can be downloaded>
<URL where the transcription for audio/video can be downloaded>
<URL where the transcription for audio/video can be downloaded>
<URL where the transcription for audio/video can be downloaded>

error.message: The transcript for localeCode en-Fr is incorrectly formatted.
Incorrectly formatted transcript for localeCode en-US
Incorrectly formatted transcript for localeCode en-US

value.message: Internal Server Error.

error.message: Not authorized. See X-Access-Error header for details

ValidationError_AudioVideo_Required.summary: Error Body for missing audio or video property

error.message: The body of the request must contain an "audio" property or a "video" property

ValidationErrorTargetOrTranscripts.summary: Error for request including both targetLocaleCodes and transcripts array

error.message: Request must include either targetLocaleCodes or transcripts array, not both

ValidationErrorMissingLocale.summary: Error for missing or unsupported localeCode

error.message: The request does not contain a localeCode property, or the value of the property is not a supported localCode
Source language unsupported

AudioSpeechNotDetectedSingle.summary: Error for no speech detected in single audio track

error.message: No speech detected in audio track

ValidationErrorRedubbing.summary: Error for attempting re-dubbing of already dubbed content

error.message: Re-dubbing is not allowed for already dubbed content

ValidationErrorProprietaryContent.summary: Error for input media with proprietary content

error.message: Input media contains proprietary content; service not licensed for such content

ValidationErrorUnrecognizedLanguage.summary: Error for unrecognized language in audio track

error.message: No speech detected in any audio track
Invalid dialogTrackNumber; should be an integer between 1 and 7

error.message: Error downloading data from input URL
Downloaded media is not a valid video file
Downloaded media is not a supported audio format

ValidationErrorVideoDuration.summary: Error for video duration exceeding limit

error.message: Video duration should be under 30 minutes
